column4: does anyone here know the syntax highlighting for gedit works?
yeah, i think it depends on the files your looking at
I mean, how might you edit what languages it recognizes? I just started messing around with processing, and whenever I load a processing file in gedit, it comes up with C syntax highlighting
looks like its going to be more than skin deep, you may have to alter the language  highlighting and im not sure where that is at
